member.name: T:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D
member.summary: A viewport control is able to render and manipulate Drawable instances in OpenGL. This control tries to mimic the functionality of WPF's Viewport3D control.

member.name: F:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.arcball
member.summary: The arcball instance that controls the transformations of the drawables inside this viewport

member.name: M:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.CreateProjectionMatrix
member.summary: Creates the projection matrix based on the control setup.
member.returns: The projection matrix

member.name: M:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.Render
member.summary: Is called when it is time to render the objects in this viewport.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.HandleKeyboard(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Handles various keyboard keypresses for object manipulation

member.name: M:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.Pick(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Performs picking and changes the SelectedDrawable property based on the drawable that was under the mouse cursor.

member.name: P:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.Camera
member.summary: The viewport's camera (defaults: Position: 0, 0, 5 LookAt: 0, 0, 0 Up: 0, 1, 0 FieldOfView: 45)

member.name: P:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.ArcballSensitivity
member.summary: Gets or sets the arcball sensitivity for manipulating drawables in this viewport

member.name: P:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.ClearColor
member.summary: The clear color used as the background of this OpenGL control (Defaults to white)

member.name: P:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.Children
member.summary: The objects that this viewport will display

member.name: P:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.SelectedDrawable
member.summary: The currently selected drawable of this viewport. This drawable will be manipulated

member.name: E:CodeFull.Controls.GLViewport3D.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Event raised when the selected drawable item has changed

member.name: T:CodeFull.Extensions.Extensions
member.summary: Provides various utility extensions methods

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Extensions.Lerp(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Double)
member.summary: Linearly interpolates between the current color and the target color
member.param: The target color to interpolate to
The interpolation value (must be between 0 and 1)
member.returns: A color that is between the current and the target color

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Extensions.ToBlittableArray(OpenTK.Vector3d)
member.summary: Converts this Vector3d instance to a sequential array of doubles. Usefull for serializing for compute kernels.
member.returns: A double[] array containing X, Y and Z components sequentially.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Extensions.Distance(OpenTK.Vector3d,OpenTK.Vector3d)
member.summary: Computes the Euclidean distance between this vector and another vector
member.returns: The Euclidean distance between the two vectors.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Extensions.Cross(OpenTK.Vector3d,OpenTK.Vector3d)
member.summary: Computes the cross product of the current vector with another vector.
member.returns: A vector that is the result of the cross product.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Extensions.Dot(OpenTK.Vector3d,OpenTK.Vector3d)
member.summary: Computes the dot product of the current vector with another vector.
member.returns: The result of the dot product between the two vectors.

member.name: T:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers
member.summary: Provides various helper methods.

member.name: F:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.Jan1st1970
member.summary: Jan, 1st, 1970 timestamp

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.CurrentTimeMillis
member.summary: Computes the timestamp based on the number of milliseconds passed since 01/01/1970
member.returns: The number of milliseconds passed since 01/01/1970

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.UnProject(System.Drawing.Point,System.Double)
member.summary: Unprojects the specified point on the screen with the specified depth to the 3D space.
member.param: The depth value in the range [0, 1] (near to far)
member.returns: The corresponding 3D point on the screen

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.Matrix4dFromArray(System.Double[])
member.summary: Constructs a Matrix4d matrix from the given array of doubles.
member.returns: The corresponding Matrix4d instance.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.GetViewport
member.summary: Obtains the OpenGL viewport array.
member.returns: The OpenGL viewport array.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.GetProjectionMatrix
member.summary: Obtains the current OpenGL projection matrix.
member.returns: The curren projection matrix.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.GetModelViewMatrix
member.summary: Obtains the current OpenGL model view matrix.
member.returns: The curren model view matrix.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.ScreenPointToRay(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Converts the provided screen point to ray. The screen point should be in window coordinate system (origin at top left).
member.returns: The corresponding ray of the screenpoint

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.GetGLMouseCoordinates(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Converts the specified mouse position from the window coordinate system to OpenGL window coordinate system (from origin at top left to origin at bottom left).
member.param: The mouse position in window coordinate system.
member.returns: The position in OpenGL window coordinate system.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.GetDepth(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Determines the depth of the point under the specified mouse cursor.
member.returns: The depth value of the position.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.GetMinimumDepthValue
member.summary: Gets the value representing the minimum depth value of the current OpenGL setup.
member.returns: The minimum depth value of the depth buffer.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.GetMaximumDepthValue
member.summary: Gets the value representing the maximum depth value of the current OpenGL setup.
member.returns: The maximum depth value of the depth buffer.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.VectorComponentSelector(System.Int32,OpenTK.Vector3d)
member.summary: Selects the vector component that corresponds to the specified index.
member.returns: X, Y or Z component if i=0, 1, 2 respectively.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.GetMinVector3d(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{OpenTK.Vector3d})
member.summary: Determines the minimum Vector3d in a collection of vertices
member.returns: The minimum vector in the vertices

member.name: M:CodeFull.Extensions.Helpers.GetMaxVector3d(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{OpenTK.Vector3d})
member.summary: Determines the maximum Vector3d in a collection of vertices
member.returns: The maximum vector in the vertices

member.name: T:CodeFull.Graphics.AABB
member.summary: Represents the axis-aligned bounding box of an object. This AABB rotates with the object but is axis-aligned in the object space.

member.summary: Defines the interface for objects that can be drawn using OpenGL

member.summary: Internally stores the centroid of this drawable

member.name: F:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.transform
member.summary: The collection of all transforms applied to this Drawable.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.CalculateCenter
member.summary: A method to calculate the centroid of this Drawable

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.Draw
member.summary: Draws the contents of this Drawable using OpenGL

member.summary: Performs a ray casting hit test using the specified ray.
member.param: The ray to perform hit test for
member.returns: The result of the hit test (if any hit occurred). null otherwise.

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.Attachments
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of drawables attached to this CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable instance

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.Center
member.summary: Gets the center point of this drawable

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.TransformedCenter
member.summary: Gets the center point of this Drawable after performing all the transformations on.

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.Transform
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of the transforms applied on this Drawable.

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.Parent
member.summary: The parent of this Drawable

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.AABB
member.summary: Gets the axis-aligned bounding box of this Drawable.

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable.ShowAABB
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the AABB is rendered.

member.name: F:CodeFull.Graphics.AABB.vertices
member.summary: The vertices of this AABB. Winding order is clockwise starting from MinPoint to MinPoint, then move up, wind clockwise again.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.AABB.#ctor(CodeFull.Graphics.Drawable,OpenTK.Vector3d,OpenTK.Vector3d)
member.summary: Initializes a new AABB instance with the specified Drawable owner and the minimum and maximum points.
member.param: The min point of this AABB.
The max point of this AABB.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.AABB.ComputeVertices
member.summary: Computes the other vertices of this bounding box.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.AABB.HitTest(CodeFull.Graphics.Geometry.Ray)
member.summary: Tests for whether the specified ray hits this AABB or not. The ray WILL NOT be modified and will be used as is. Make sure to pass the ray that will be in this AABB's space.
member.param: The Ray to perform the hit test for.
member.returns: The result of the hit test, or null if no hit occurs.

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.AABB.MinPoint
member.summary: The minimum point of this OBB

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.AABB.MaxPoint
member.summary: The maximum point of this OBB

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.AABB.HalfPoints
member.summary: The half-lengths of each direction

member.name: T:CodeFull.Graphics.Arcball
member.summary: Arcball is used to implement intuitive rotations using the mouse. This implementation is based on NeHe's implementation for C++

member.summary: The last set mouse cursor position

member.name: F:CodeFull.Graphics.Arcball.clickStartVector
member.summary: Start of the click vector (mapped to the sphere)

member.name: F:CodeFull.Graphics.Arcball.clickEndVector
member.summary: End of the click vector (mapped to the sphere)

member.summary: The height of the OpenGL canvas

member.summary: A mapping of the mouse button to their pressed status

member.summary: Instantiates a new Arcball with the specified boundaries for the width and height

member.summary: Handles the operations that need to be performed when the mouse button is pressed.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.Arcball.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the operations that need to be performed when the mouse button is released.

member.summary: Maps the given point to the sphere and returns the resulting vector
member.param: The point to map to sphere
member.returns: The vector of the mapped point

member.summary: Set the boundaries of the mouse click

member.summary: Sets the pressed status of the specified mouse button
member.param: The pressed status of that button

member.summary: Sets the start position of the mouse

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.Arcball.GetRotation(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Calculate the rotation for the current point

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.Arcball.ApplyTransforms(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Applies all the transformations possible based on the current status of mouse buttons
member.param: The current position of the mouse cursor

member.summary: The sensitivity of this arcball (default is 0.01)

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Arcball.Drawable
member.summary: The drawable that this arcball instance performs on

member.name: T:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera
member.summary: Represents a camera in OpenGL

member.summary: Creates a new Camera instance.
member.param: The world position of the camera.
The up direction of the camera (usually (0, 1, 0)).
The field of view of the camera in degrees.
The near clipping distance of the camera.
The far clipping distance of the camera.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new Camera instance located on the origin of the world space, looking at (0, 0, 0) with the unit Y axis specified as the up direction, with 45 degrees field of view and 0.1 and 64 specified as the near clipping and far clipping distances respectively.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera.CreateModelViewMatrix
member.summary: Creates the model view matrix based on the camera setup.
member.returns: The model view matrix.

member.summary: Gets the distance of this camera to the specified point.
member.param: The point to calculate the distance to.
member.returns: The distance of this camera to the point.

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera.MainCamera
member.summary: Gets or sets the main viewing camera of OpenGL

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of this camera in 3D space

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera.LookAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the point in 3D space that this camera is looking at

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera.Up
member.summary: Gets or sets the up direction of this camera

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera.FieldOfView
member.summary: Gets or sets the field of view of this camera (in degrees)

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera.NearClip
member.summary: Camera's near clipping distance

member.name: P:CodeFull.Graphics.Camera.FarClip
member.summary: Camera's far clipping distance

member.summary: Computes the axis-aligned bounding box of this mesh.

member.summary: Calculates the center point of this mesh

member.summary: Registers the handles VBO of this mesh with OpenGL and initializes the data.

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.Mesh.Draw
member.summary: Draws the mesh using OpenGL. The method must be called in a drawing context (after setting the view properties and performing clearing)

member.name: M:CodeFull.Graphics.Mesh.HitTest(CodeFull.Graphics.Geometry.Ray)
member.summary: Performs a ray casting hit test using the specified ray. This function does not take the ray into its own space! Thus make sure the ray is specified in the space of this object (with proper transforms applied to it).
member.param: The ray to perform hit test for
member.returns: The result of the hit test if anything occurred. null otherwise.
